title: Delinquent penalties; seizure and sale for tax and fee
context: ยง249-34 Delinquent penalties; seizure and sale for tax and fee. Any tax or fee imposed under sections 249-31 and 249-33 for any year and not paid when due shall be subject to the penalties provided in section 249-10. [L 1978, c 159, ยง4; am L 1981, c 50, ยง4]
